EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Delivering Innovation To Market Faster_FS Workshop_Q215.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited: Financial Services Workshop - Delivering Innovation To Market Faster
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/delivering-innovation-to-market-faster-workshop/london> Leadership at the most senior levels in financial services companies are concerned about the threat from digital startups whose business model is all about delivering superior business innovation and customer experiences faster and cheaper through software.
To respond, IT needs a more agile approach to developing, deploying, managing and updating the innovative new cloud-native applications which the business needs to survive and thrive. TUESDAY
June 2, 2015
3:00 PM - 6:00 PM
Pivotal London Office REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/delivering-innovation-to-market-faster-workshop/london>
